query: for God so|that whoever believes in him

results.text: that whoever believes in him may have eternal life.
results.textEnhanced: that whoever believes in him may have eternal life.

results.text: “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
results.textEnhanced: “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
